participants contact The individual to contact with questions about this record data_category General category of data in this Record (e doi Digital Object Identifier (DOI) for this Record email An email address to reach the entity expected_number_of_participants Total expected number of participants to be recruited external_id Other identifiers for this entity, eg, from the submitting study or in system... funding_source The funding source(s) of the study id INLCUDE Global ID for this record institution Name of the institution this record is associated with invesitgator_title The title of the Investigator, eg, "Assistant Professor" name Name of the entity parent_study The parent study for this study, if it is a nested study participant_lifespan_stage Focus age group(s) of the study population principal_investigator The Principal Investigator(s) responsible for the study program Funding source(s) for the study publication Publications associated with this Record research_domain Main research domain(s) of the study, other than Down syndrome selection_criteria Brief description of inclusion and/or exclusion criteria for the study study_code Unique identifier for the study (generally a short acronym) study_description Brief description of the study (2-4 sentences) study_design Overall design of study, including whether it is longitudinal and whether fam... study_short_name Short name for the study study_title Full Study Title uuid Internally assigned UUID for data management and QC purposes vbr Information about the study's Virtual Biorepository, if participating vbr_readme Instructions for contacting or requesting samples from Virtual Biorepository,... website Website for the Record
